Posts.Content: 2days after my first treatment with Taxol. I could not walk. The pain in my knees which are severely arthritic hurt so bad I could not see straight. I called the on call dr and was told to take 2 Motrin and 2 Tylenol at once. It did help some. My husband bought me a rolling walker so I could walk without falling.
Posts.Title: leg and knee pain during chemo
